description: Ministry of Labour & Trade Union Relations - Appointed S. Virithamulla to be arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between G. C. M. A. Jayawardena & Sri Lanka Foundation - Revocation Mr. Virithamulla & Appointed Mr. P. Danansooriya to be arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between  M. A. Ranasinghe & Sri Lanka Airlines Limited - Appointed Mr. Suneth Lokubogahawatta as arbitrator to the Industrial dispute between Inter Company Employees Union &Bogala Graphite Lanka PLC - Appointed Mr. P. Nawarathna as arbirator to the Industrial Dispute between S. G. J. Barbutt and Life Insurance Corporation Lanka Limited
